data.text: @PhilippineStar @onenewsph Again, why 53? 53 countries lang b un tinamaan ng pandemic?

@PhilippineStar @onenewsph We need to stop it with that ranking.  A good rating is a “nice to have” but achieving it it outside our risk appetite & capacity to absorb risk.  We shouldn’t allow ourselves to be pressured into opening faster than what we consider safe given conditions or altogether prudent.
